Champaign.Bailey-Rugg Building:
The Bailey-Rugg Building was a historic commercial building located at 219-225 North Neil Street in Champaign, Illinois.


== Description and history ==
Businessmen David Bailey and Daniel Rugg built the building as a joint venture in 1871; each merchant occupied half of the building, with a common staircase connecting the two halves. The three-story, brick building had an Italianate design.
